level.heading: FAILURE TO APPEAR FOR A HEARING (ยง 30-406)

level.text: If a party to any proceeding under this chapter shall waive a hearing or, without sufficient reason, fail to appear at the time and place set for the hearing, the hearing examiner may proceed to hear the matter on the record.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to December 29, 1989, the D.C. Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 2202, 2210 (May 28, 1992).
